meanings.definition: Able to be flushed down a toilet.
meanings.sent1: The toilet paper was flushable, so it went down easily.
meanings.sent2: The wipes were labeled as flushable, so I knew they were safe for the toilet.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped the flushable toy in the toilet, but luckily it didn't clog.
meanings.sent4: Her idea was as flushable as a tissue down the drain - it disappeared quickly.
meanings.sent5: The flushable label on the packaging made it clear it was safe for the toilet.

meanings.definition: Suitable for flushing down a toilet.
meanings.sent1: The flushable wipes were gentle on the skin and safe for the toilet.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to only use flushable products in the bathroom to avoid clogging.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his new invention was so flushable, it could even go down a golden toilet.
meanings.sent4: The idea of forgiveness is like a flushable item - it can be let go and disappear.
meanings.sent5: The flushable label on the packaging assured customers it was safe for the toilet.
